groups.name: Footer

fields.name: Number of columns per row
fields.description:
Number of columns to display at the largest screen size.
"Auto" will determine the number of columns based on the number of items.

fields.name: Iframe Tag
fields.description: Description: Use this to embed an iframe like a Google Map iframe. Use the Media Embed element for YouTube videos or other media.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: This is like the "Alt text" for images, but for iframes.

fields.name: Number of columns per row
fields.description:
Number of columns to display at the largest screen size.
"Auto" will determine the number of columns based on the number of items.

fields.name: How to Display Image
fields.description:
"Scale to fit" means that the image will be scaled to fit in a perfect square.
"Fit" means that the image will be centered but will not be displayed as a perfect square

fields.name: Number of columns per row
fields.description:
Number of columns to display at the largest screen size.
"Auto" will determine the number of columns based on the number of items.

fields.name: Display content
fields.description: Showing text "Behind Image" will have the text show when you hover over the image.

fields.name: How to Display Image
fields.description:
"Scale to fit" means that the image will be scaled to fit in a perfect square.
"Fit" means that the image will be centered but will not be displayed as a perfect square

fields.name: Display Content
fields.description: Showing text "Behind Image" will have the text show when you hover over the image.

fields.name: Embed URL
fields.description: Enter the URL of the media content. For example, for YouTube simply enter the URL to view the video on the YouTube website.
